description: Plenty of people are averse to Cher’s music.
title: I'm not a fan of Cher, says Cher as she claims her own music is "crap"

author: Spiegel Online
description: Kaum zu glauben, aber Cher ist tatsächlich schon 71: Bei den Billboard Music Awards am Sonntagabend legte die Sängerin einen Las-Vegas-würdigen Auftritt hin. Erst präsentierte sie ihren Neunziger-Hit "Believe" - in einem Outfit, das nicht viel verdeckte.
title: Billboard Music Awards: Cher dreht die Zeit zurück

author: KRISTIN M. HALL
description: Drake was a high roller in Las Vegas, beating Adele's record for most wins at the Billboard Music Awards. Cher and Celine Dion each reflected on their own iconic careers and amazing songs on Sunday night's awards show, while a moment of silence was held for rocker Chris Cornell, who died Thursday in Detroit. Miley Cyrus delivered an emotional, but low-key performance and Vanessa Hudgens shined as co-host. These are the top moments from the awards show. ___ DRAKE'S LUCKY 13
title: Drake dominates, Cher reflects at Billboard Music Awards

description: (AP) -- Drake was a high roller in Las Vegas, beating Adele's record for most wins at the Billboard Music Awards. Cher and Celine Dion each reflected on their own iconic careers and amazing songs on Sunday night's awards show, while a moment of silence was held for rocker Chris Cornell, who died Thursday in Detroit. Miley Cyrus delivered an emotional, but low-key performance and Vanessa Hudgens shined as co-host.
title: Drake Dominates, Cher Reflects At Billboard Music Awards

author: Raisa Bruner
description: From Drake's literally fiery rap to another iconic performance from Cher.
title: Here Are the Best and Worst Moments From the Billboard Music Awards 2017
